Welcome I want to build an index

```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
files <- list.files("gallery_files", recursive = TRUE)
files <- files[grep("\\.html$", files)]
for (i in seq_along(files)) {
  cat(sprintf("[%s](gallery_files/%s)", files[1], files[1]))  
}

```
